LanguageData.BR_OrionPart_Eye.label: orion bionic eye
LanguageData.BR_OrionPart_Eye.description: A bionic eye engineered with orion.\n\n"I can see."
LanguageData.BR_OrionPart_Arm.label: orion bionic arm
LanguageData.BR_OrionPart_Arm.description: A bionic arm engineered with orion.\n\n"It sure is an arm."
LanguageData.BR_OrionPart_Leg.label: orion bionic leg
LanguageData.BR_OrionPart_Leg.description: A bionic leg engineered with orion. It is incredibly light and strong, behaving nearly identically to real legs and functioning far better.
LanguageData.BR_OrionPart_Spine.label: orion bionic spine
LanguageData.BR_OrionPart_Spine.description: A bionic spine engineered with orion. It is incredibly light and strong, behaving nearly identically to a real spine and functioning far better.
